root: ^Warrior:Oi, robes come over here! You have any idea what's going on!!

c-0: ^Warrior:The hell you mean no! Aren't you some type of magi!!!!

intro: ^:If you have any idea then speak!
name: ^Warrior:What's it to you, ya bag a bones?
^Heldar:Heldar's my name and I'm a veteran warrior of the emerald plains!
ev
str
^Emerald Plains?
/str
/ev

c-0: ^Heldar:How do you not know of the Emerald Plains!? Those plains have been designated as a high risk zone due to hazardous magical phenomena.
^Heldar:The monsters in that area have adapted to that region, making them strange and agressive.
^Heldar:People like me who've grown up in such a place are better than most.

where: ^:I know just as much as the other two.
^:One moment I'm on the hunt and in the next I'm here with these two limp wrist fools.
why: ^:It's hard to say, stuff like this happening isn't unheard of.
^:Maybe it is simply another phenomena of the emerald plains.
^:That doesn't explain why the other two are here though...
ending: ^:So you don't know anything!? USELESS MAGI!!
